meta.title: FinSight AI: Agentic AI for Precise MSME Credit Underwriting
meta.description: Beyond OCR. FinSight AI uses Agentic AI to deliver autonomous bank statement analysis and forgery detection for MSMEs and thin-filers in just 5 minutes.
meta.ogTitle: FinSight AI: The Autonomous Underwriting Partner for SE Asia
meta.ogDescription: Stop manual checks. Our AI agent infers transaction context, detects forgeries, and generates financial statement-level intelligence instantly. Decide with confidence in 5 minutes.
meta.keywords: Autonomous Credit Underwriting AI Agent, Agentic AI fintech, bank statement analysis automation, MSME credit scoring, thin-file lending SE Asia, fraud detection AI, financial profiling Indonesia

manual.descriptionTitle: Manual processing of 1,000+ pages per loan involving

ai.descriptionTitle: An end-to-end autonomous workflow that masters months of bank statements

items.title: Beyond Rule-based: Context-Aware Reasoning AI Agent
items.description:
Moves beyond rigid, rule-based systems to understand "why" a transaction occurred :
distinguishing business inventory from personal spending.

items.title: One-click submission validation : Zero Manual Effort for Complex Validations
items.description: Stop opening files one-by-one; our AI agent instantly audits every submission for both authenticity and compliance, providing real-time feedback to pinpoint missing requirements and slash applicant churn.

items.title: Adversarial Fraud Intelligence: Mastering the 'DNA' of Authentic Statements
items.description:
Our AI agent identifies the subtle 'impossible' transactions and logical flaws that even the most pixel-perfect forgeries can't hide.

Beyond Human Oversight: While a human eye sees a document, our agent sees the structural inconsistencies that reveal a file has been tampered with.

items.title: Hyper-Local AI Agents: Master the Context of Indonesian Finance
items.description: Powered by a proprietary knowledge database that mastered the unique nuances of every Indonesian financial institutions' secret words.

section4.title:
Agentic Transformation:
Success Stories in AI-Driven Financing

quotes: What used to take our expert 3 days, manually reconciling accounts receivable lists with bank statement, FinSight Al completes in under 1 minutes with superior accuracy.

It even detects transactions that manual reviews often miss. This shift allows our team to focus on high-value decision-making rather than data processing, giving us the agility to aggressively expand our supply chain finance business.

items.name: Credit Analyst Z
quotes: Finsight Al has been a game-changer for our workflow. It drastically reduced our analysis time, enabling faster and more accurate credit decisions and improved turnaround time.
With its industry-specific transaction categorization and automated insights, it is the ultimate tool for maximizing both productivity and efficiency.
Beyond speed, it detects hidden debt obligations that never appear on standard credit reports. This capability allows us to spot and mitigate 'invisible risks' that reports often miss.

items.name: CTO D
quotes: Finsight Al unlocked the '30-minute digital small to mid sized ticket loan market opportunity for us - a segment previously unreachable due to high processing costs.

Unlike other major solutions that function merely as CR tools due to a lack of local context, FinSight Al delivers deep, actionable intelligence. It has become our core engine for scalable customer acquisition.

intro.subtitle: Privacy Notice for Demo Request
intro.description: To provide you with the best demo experience, FinProfile Co., Ltd. ("we", "us") collects and processes your personal data in compliance with global data protection laws.

sections.title: Data We Collect
items: Contact Info: Name, email address, phone number.
Professional Info: Company name, job title, industry.
Interests: Specific solutions or features you are interested in.

sections.title: Purpose of Collection
items: To schedule and conduct the requested product demo.
To provide personalized information about our services.
To follow up with relevant marketing and sales communications. (you may opt-out at any time)

sections.title: Legal Basis
items: We process your data based on your explicit consent and our legitimate interest in providing the services you requested.

sections.title: Data Retention & Sharing
items: Retention: We keep your data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes mentioned above or as required by law.
Sharing: We do not sell your data. We do not share the data and use it solely for the purposes stated above.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.description: Regardless of your location, you have the right to:
items: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
Restrict or object to data processing.

sections.title: International Transfers
items: As we operate globally, your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your residence. We ensure all transfers comply with applicable protection standards.

sections.title: Contact Us
items: For any privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at: hello@finprofile.id
